mapper.update: UPDATE tb_cart_product cp JOIN tb_product_inventory pi ON cp.prod_cd = pi.prod_cd SET cp.soldout_yn = IF((pi.curr_inv - pi.safe_inv) <= 0, 'y', 'n') WHERE cp.cart_seq = #{cartSeq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_cart_product cp where cp.cart_seq = #{cartSeq} and del_yn <> 'y' and soldout_yn <> 'y'

SELECT cp.cart_prod_seq, cp.prod_cd, cp.opt_seq, cp.typ, cp.soldout_yn, cp.qty as cpQty, IFNULL(po.qty, 1) AS poQty, IFNULL(CONCAT(p.name, po.name), p.name) AS name, IFNULL(p.cnsmr_prc, po.cnsmr_prc) AS cnsmr_prc, IFNULL(p.sale_prc, po.sale_prc) AS sale_prc FROM tb_cart_product cp JOIN tb_product p ON cp.prod_cd = p.prod_cd LEFT JOIN tb_product_option po ON cp.opt_seq = po.opt_seq WHERE cp.cart_seq = #{cartSeq} AND cp.del_yn <> 'y' order by cp.typ
